name: Money Farm
summary: Hey you! Ya, you! Are you a poor, broke loser who is down on their luck? If the answer is yes, then oh boy, does Soke Co. industry have the deal for you! For the low low, price of 1 billion dollars, Soke Co. industry will lease you one of their patented money farms! But wait, a billion dollars isn't a low price for you. Never fear, friend Soke Co. won't ask for anything upfront, and after you start, money will grow on trees. It's a deal too good to be true. So what are you waiting for? Sign up for your money farm today!
